mean_cn: n.婉转曲折的说法，累赘的陈述，遁辞
mean_en: the use of many words to say something that could be said more clearly and directly by using fewer words
sentence: His circumlocutions are so frustrating. Why doesn\u0027t he just say what he means?
sentence_trans: 他拐弯抹角的说话方式太烦人了。为什么他就不能直说呢？
word_etyma: circum绕圈 ＋ locu说话 ＋ tion名词后缀 → circumlocution转弯抹角说话
